QuestData.Title: Welcome to Dawn's Blossom
QuestData.Description: Cho's off on another one of his adventures, and this one requires a big order of jade. I'm going to have to call in some favors.$b$bHow 'bout in the meantime you introduce yourself to some of the locals.$b$bKai Wanderbrew is a good guy to know, as is Master Windfur. Oh, and say hi to Peiji Goldendraft up at the inn.$b$bBetween the three of them, you should get the feel for life in Dawn's Blossom.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Kai Wanderbrew, Master Windfur, and Peiji Goldendraft in Dawn's Blossom.
QuestData.RewardText: Good, good, good. You're going to fit right in.
